column1:
符文学院院长，外貌清秀，是学院内「实用学派」的领导者，研究能够带来给人们便利生活的符文魔法。与奥斯塔的老师莫里斯是莫逆之交。

个性温和幽默、脸上不论何时都带着一抹微笑，所以深受符文学院学生们的喜爱，但俊俏的外表和实际谈吐似乎有着年龄上落差。

本身是个生活白痴，偶尔也会因为埋首研究忘记吃饭。
column2:
Headmaster of the Rune Academy and Head of Applied Magic, whose research focuses on improving the lives of common folk. Holds strong ties with Morris, Aosta's old mentor.

Has a wonderful sense of humor and is always seen with a smile, which earned him popularity among the pupils of Rune Academy. Even so, he speaks with a wisdom far beyond the years of his appearance.

Is incapable of living alone and knocks over things due to clumsiness. Tends to forget eating once completely buried in research.

column1:
符文学院院长，外貌清秀，是学院内「实用学派」的领导者，研究能够带来给人们便利生活的符文魔法。与奥斯塔的老师莫里斯是莫逆之交。

个性温和幽默、脸上不论何时都带着一抹微笑，所以深受符文学院学生们的喜爱，但俊俏的外表和实际谈吐似乎有着年龄上落差。

本身是个生活白痴，偶尔也会因为埋首研究忘记吃饭。

column1:
居住在啼林谷的豹族兽人，体态健美性感、身手矫健，为豹族一只部队的小队长。

性格刚烈、剽悍并且好恶分明，观念保守，守护着豹族的传统文化，对符文科技抱持着抗拒之心。

有很强的领域意识，对熟识的人会稍微放松戒心，但对于进入势力范围的陌生人，就会带有强烈的敌意。
column2:
Panther native of Whistlewood Valley, a beautiful, sensual and lithe leader of Panther warriors. 

Passionate, fierce and a good judge of character, she is naturally conservative and a champion of cultural traditions, who is highly suspicious and resistant of rune technologies. 

Is extremely territorial with a tight circle of trust, and deals with trespassers severely.

用特殊颜料在身上涂绘战斗图腾，是豹族参与生死战役前的仪式，亦是法蒂玛决心捍卫部落的证明。

column1:
法蒂玛被选为主持豹族四年一度的『传达祭仪』的女祭司。

为了表示对先祖的尊敬，法蒂玛必须花费百日的时间准备。期间法蒂玛不可杀生，每日必须进行数次的冥想与沐浴净身，非必要时不可与人交谈。

『传达祭仪』当日，身为女祭司的法蒂玛，会透过自身传递先祖的声音给族人，并聆听先祖赐予部族的教诲。而豹族会献上肥美的猎物与香醇的果实酒，来感谢先祖四年来的庇佑，并祈求伟大的先祖未来继续守护豹族部落。
column2:
Fatima was selected as the priestess to host the Panthers' quadrennial "Inheritance Ritual". 

In order to show respect to the ancestors, Fatima must spend a hundred days to prepare for this event. During this hundred days, Fatima is not allowed to kill. She must meditate and shower multiple times a day to cleanse herself. Unless absolutely required, she is not allowed to talk with others. 

On the day of the "Inheritance Ritual", as the priestess, Fatima must deliver the ancestor's voice to her fellow Panthers. She must also listen to the teachings given to the tribe by the ancestors. Other Panthers will offer meaty prey and fragrant fruit wines to thank the ancestors for their blessings for the past four years. They will also pray to the great ancestors to continue to look over the Panther tribe in the future.

column1:
机器商人夏洛克的养女，居住于沙漠市集。因为夏洛克的过分溺爱，所以有些骄纵任性。

拥有着傲人的身材曲线与胸围，外表成熟性感。性格豪放、吊儿郎当，不太避讳与别人的肢体接触，不认识的人总以为她是十分开放、随便的女性，但其实意外地是一位容易娇羞的少女，且十分专情。
column2:
Adopted daughter of Sherlock, the mechanical merchant, she resides within the Desert Bazaar. Sherlock spoils her rotten, making her a bit of a brat. 

She possesses a fulsome figure that looks good from any angle. 
Uninhibited and carefree, she's always bumping into people's elbows. People who don't know her may think she's easy, but she's actually quite shy and romantic in her own way.

column1:
机器商人夏洛克的养女。

儿时在战场上遇见沙漠市集商人夏洛克，夏洛克看中其招揽客人的天赋而收养。刚被收养的丽莎是个乖巧听话，独立有礼貌的小女孩，每天都尽责地跳舞帮夏洛克招揽生意。

一日，养父夏洛克被讨债商人绑架，年仅六岁的丽莎着急得不知如何是好，病急乱投医地装备上夏洛克散落在家中，来自机械疆域的各种道具与武器，只身闯入敌营，营救夏洛克！
column2:
Mechanican merchant Sherlock's adopted daughter.

When she was a child, she met Desert Bazaar merchant Sherlock on the battlefield. After noticing her talent to gather a crowd, Sherlock adopted her. When she was adopted, Lisa was a cute, independent and polite little girl. She did her job well, dancing at Sherlock's booth every day to help him gather customers.

One day, her foster father Sherlock was kidnapped by debt collectors. The then six-year-old Lisa, in all her panic and desperation, turned her eyes to the equipment that has been lying around in Sherlock's home. Armed with a whole arsenal of gadgets and weapons from the Mechanical Empire, young Lisa broke into the enemy's stronghold by herself and would stop at nothing until she rescued her dear father!

column1:
居住于彭列瓦沙漠的鳞族猎户青年，下半身拥有蜥蜴的鳞片特征。

整体身材精壮、肤色黝黑，笑起来给人太阳一般温暖的感觉；内在心思细腻、温柔体贴，是个能给人安全感、值得信赖的男人。

凭着一身打猎技巧，以及沙漠盗贼的贸易往来，悠闲在沙漠度过平凡的每一天。
column2:
A juvenile of the scaled hunters that inhabit the Poleva Desert, his lower body is covered with lizard scales akin to the rest of his tribe. 

Muscular and dark skinned, he can light up the room with his genuine smile. Thoughtful, considerate, and reliable, he's the kind of guy you'd take home to meet your mom, if it weren't for his freaky lizard legs. 

Hunting skills and trade contacts among the desert bandits make every day in the desert a holiday!

column1:
来自机械疆域，是个以斤斤计较、贪财出名的机器商人。

本体是个小机器人，平常驾驶着大机器人的身体行动，更喜欢边数钱边笑。因故收养了丽莎当养女，并且十分溺爱。

情报收集能力十分优秀，手边的商品大多应有尽有，本着奸商的性格，商品也总是翻价卖出，但因为不管多难取得的稀有品他也能得手，因此不缺乏前来光顾的客人。
column2:
A greedy merchant from the Mechanical Empire, infamously known for haggling over every last penny. 

Is actually a small robot that likes to ride around in bigger robots. His favorite pastime is counting money with a smile on his face. Somehow he ended up raising Lisa and dotes on her terribly. 

His eidetic memory excels at gathering intel and his stockrooms are almost always bursting with trinkets of every kind. As you'd expect from an untrustworthy businessman, he often makes a good profit. Customers keep coming back, however, because he has an uncanny ability to source items that nobody else can find.

夏洛克发财赚大钱后，第一件事便是给自己换个帅气的机械身体，这就是夏洛克的奢华浪漫哲学〜
column2:
A greedy merchant from the Mechanical Empire, infamously known for haggling over every last penny. 

Is actually a small robot that likes to ride around in bigger robots. His favorite pastime is counting money with a smile on his face. Somehow he ended up raising Lisa and dotes on her terribly.

After securing a huge fortune, his top priority was to purchase the most flamboyant shell in existence, as looks mean everything in his materialistic world.

column1:
来自东方联邦的水豚兽人，说话有东方特有的腔调用语，目前正在枫湖畔隐居中。

外表慈祥和蔼、有点痴呆，行为举止和说话速度都很缓慢、有一种浑然天成的喜感；其实本性深藏不露，战斗动作敏捷，可以察觉到敌方细微的举动，是个老练的武功高手。

平日最爱悠然自得的边欣赏风景边饮酒，并与自己头上的小鸟互动。
column2:
A capybara from the East Alliance, whom speaks in the lilting tongue of the Orient. 

Currently hiding out in Maple Lake. 
This harmless looking simpleton appears sluggish of body and mind. In reality, he is a shrewd operator with excellent situational awareness and formidable martial arts ability.

Likes to spend his time enjoying the scenery while savoring fine wine, and also interacting with the little birds that land on his head.

当扬波解放深藏于体内，来自东方联邦秘传的神秘力量时，腾云驾雾也并非难事。
column2:
A capybara from the East Alliance, whom speaks in the lilting tongue of the Orient. 

Currently hiding out in Maple Lake. 
This harmless looking simpleton appears sluggish of body and mind. In reality, he is a shrewd operator with excellent situational awareness and formidable martial arts ability.

Likes to spend his time enjoying the scenery while savoring fine wine, and also interacting with the little birds that land on his head.

Once unleashing a secret power known only to those within the Alliance, you won't find his head in the clouds, but rather his feet standing on a celestial stepping stone from the skies.

column1:
生活在枫湖畔湖底的人鱼，幼年时就遭人绑架，并恶意放生于此。

性格古灵精怪、调皮，是个想到就做的及时行乐派；也因为好客热情的个性，很快就能和初识的人熟络。和扬波及所有枫湖畔生物关系良好，唯独极度讨厌邪恶的卡努拉。

虽然是人鱼但在陆上也有行动能力。唱起歌来有着动人的美妙音色。
column2:
A mermaid lingering amongst the depths of Maple Lake, kidnapped and dumped here at a young age.

Peculiar, mischievous and impulsive, she can surprisingly befriend others quickly due to her open and enthusiastic personality. Is on good terms with all Maple Lake residents except for the wicked Karnulla, who she absolutely despises. 

Unlike a fish out of water, she doesn't lose her mobility upon dry land. Her singing voice is so lovely it has been known to make hardened criminals cry.

column1:
蛙鳄卡努拉从东方商人的身上弄到了奇怪的密药，骗荷丝缇雅吃下后，荷丝缇雅竟然褪去了鱼尾，长出双足！

本来用双腿在湖畔欢乐奔跑的她，却发现自己无法流畅说话。经过扬波的提点，才知道原来密药虽会让人鱼族长出双腿，但也会失去大部分的声音。

扬波同时告诉可怜的荷丝缇雅，如果不在日落前服用解药，她就再也不能潜入水底遨游，也将永远失去她最自豪的歌喉……

但荷丝缇雅绝不轻言放弃！即使翻遍整个枫湖畔，她也要在日落前找到被卡努拉藏起的解药，狠狠地教训那只坏心眼的蛙鳄！
column2:
The frogodile Karnulla got his hands on a strange medicine from a dealer who came from the east. After Hestia was tricked into drinking the medicine, her fishtail faded away and became a pair of legs! 

At first, she was happily running around the lake shores with her newly-grown legs. However, she soon discovered that she could no longer talk properly. It was only after a hint from Yan-Bo did she finally realize that though the medicine does allow mermaids to grow legs, it also takes away most of their voice as a price. 

At the same time, Yan-Bo also informed poor Hestia, that if she doesn't take the cure before sunset, she won't be able to swim underwater ever again. She will also lose the one thing she's most proud of, her singing voice, forever... 

But Hestia never gives up without a fight! Even if this means that she must turn the entire Maple Lake area upside down, she will still find the cure that has been hidden by Karnulla before sunset. Afterward, she is going to teach that nasty frogodile a serious lesson!

column1:
生活在枫湖畔的恶霸，自诩为湖畔霸王，个性蛮横无礼，为枫湖畔原生种蛙鳄。

生性凶恶又奸诈，讲话超大声，觉得全枫湖畔居民都是蛙鳄的食物。会用头上的可爱植物进行伪装，诱捕其他居住在湖中的生物。
领导着其他蛙鳄一同行动。

和人鱼荷丝缇雅的关系很差，内心也极度憎恶老水豚扬波。
column2:
The self proclaimed "Tyrant of the Lake", needless to say this frogodile inhabitant is unpleasant in the extreme.

Vicious and crafty, he speaks in an obnoxiously loud voice and views all other residents of Maple Lake as food. He carefully places little succulent plants on his head to entice other creatures to come closer. 

An all around troublemaker who leads other frogodiles. Dislikes the mermaid Hestia and loathes Yan-Bo, the old capybara with a passion.

领导着其他蛙鳄一同行动。

和人鱼荷丝缇雅的关系很差，内心也极度憎恶老水豚扬波。

因曾与扬波学习过隐匿气息的方法，再搭配上一对巨爪和利牙，成年卡努拉诱杀猎物的动作越发成熟。
column2:
The self proclaimed "Tyrant of the Lake", needless to say this frogodile inhabitant is unpleasant in the extreme.

Vicious and crafty, he speaks in an obnoxiously loud voice and views all other residents of Maple Lake as food. He carefully places little succulent plants on his head to entice other creatures to come closer. 

An all around troublemaker who leads other frogodiles. Dislikes the mermaid Hestia and loathes Yan-Bo, the old capybara with a passion.

Mastering breath holding thanks to Yan-Bo's guidance, paired with razor sharp claws and fangs is an unstoppable silent shredder no creature is safe from.

column1:
生活在枫湖畔的恶霸，自诩为湖畔霸王，个性蛮横无礼，为枫湖畔原生种蛙鳄。

生性凶恶又奸诈，讲话超大声，觉得全枫湖畔居民都是蛙鳄的食物。会用头上的可爱植物进行伪装，诱捕其他居住在湖中的生物。
领导着其他蛙鳄一同行动。

和人鱼荷丝缇雅的关系很差，内心也极度憎恶老水豚扬波。

因曾与扬波学习过隐匿气息的方法，再搭配上一对巨爪和利牙，成年卡努拉诱杀猎物的动作越发成熟。
column2:
The self proclaimed "Tyrant of the Lake", needless to say this frogodile inhabitant is unpleasant in the extreme.

Vicious and crafty, he speaks in an obnoxiously loud voice and views all other residents of Maple Lake as food. He carefully places little succulent plants on his head to entice other creatures to come closer. 

An all around troublemaker who leads other frogodiles. Dislikes the mermaid Hestia and loathes Yan-Bo, the old capybara with a passion.

Mastering breath holding thanks to Yan-Bo's guidance, paired with razor sharp claws and fangs is an unstoppable silent shredder no creature is safe from.

column1:
晴空草原上贩卖木偶的流动摊贩，个性文静温柔，生性害羞，不太擅长与陌生人交谈，所以说话都是小小声。

母亲在怀孕时被亚特拉斯大爆发所波及，虽然在去世后没多久便紧急产下诺瓦，但诺瓦体内却因此残留着魔物魂能而染上『裂隙病』。

每逢裂隙吸时会难以控制陷入沉睡，因沉睡时身体不会成长，也没有沉睡时的记忆，所以诺瓦虽然已经35岁，心智年龄和外表却停留在22岁。
column2:
A traveling puppet merchant of Paradise Prairie who is gentle, softly spoken, and socially awkward, especially in front of strangers. 

Nolva's mother died in labor following the destruction of Atlas. Born among fire and brimstone, Nolva contracted "Void Disease" from the residual Soul Energy of monsters. 

Whenever the void inhaling season nears, Nolva does not age, nor have any memory during her prolonged slumber. That's why, although she is 35, she still looks and thinks like a 22 year old.

A traveling puppet merchant of Paradise Prairie who is gentle, softly spoken, and socially awkward, especially in front of strangers. 

Nolva's mother died in labor following the destruction of Atlas. Born among fire and brimstone, Nolva contracted "Void Disease" from the residual Soul Energy of monsters. 

Whenever the void inhaling season nears, Nolva does not age, nor have any memory during her prolonged slumber. That's why, although she is 35, she still looks and thinks like a 22 year old.

While asleep, the monster Waverlyde awakes within her body, keeping both of them out of harm's way when she is unconscious.

column1:
诺瓦在村中念故事书给村里的孩童听，就连自己也深受童话故事的吸引。

当晚诺瓦做了一个梦──她掉进不可思议的世界里。魔物威弗烈德在梦境中化为一只笑脸猫，陪伴着诺瓦四处游历，认识了各种奇奇怪怪的朋友，甚至令诺瓦陷入了前所未有的危机！

为了逃离荒诞的梦境，诺瓦运用着她在梦中控制魔物的新能力，在威弗烈德的指引下，展开一场惊险刺激的奇妙冒险！
column2:
Nolva was reading a storybook to the village children. The fairy tale was so brilliant that even Nolva herself was enthralled by it. That night, Nolva had a dream ── She fell into a mysterious and incredible world.

The monster Waverlyde has been reimagined as the Cheshire Cat and accompanied Nolva to many places. She got to know all kinds of bizarre friends and even got herself into some unprecedented danger!

In order to escape this fantastically ridiculous dream, Nolva had to utilize her new power of controlling monsters. Under Waverlyde's guidance, they embark on an exciting adventure in wonderland!

column1:
被只身派往枫湖畔执行勘查任务的长枪女兵。自我感觉良好，会用老子自称，但是娇小的外表与可爱的声音，只让她的凶恶语气显得格格不入，一点威胁性都没有。

说话很不坦率，却非常容易被套话。一旦被套出真心话后，就会开始闹别扭而发怒。虽然想要与周围的人打好关系，但由于白目而不自知的个性而屡屡受挫。被同僚孤立，是部队里的头痛人物。
column2:
A female lancer that was sent to Maple Lake for a solo survey mission. A bit egotistical, she speaks in a vicious, almost threatening manner. However, her small figure and cute voice contradicts her own mannerisms, erasing any sense of threat.

Her words are very insincere. However, it's rather easy to know her honest opinion as she can be easily induced into telling the truth. Once she realizes that she had spilled the beans, she throws temper tantrums in an effort to hide her embarrassment. Despite desperately wanting to build a good relationship with others, she fails time after time due to her clueless and oblivious personality. She became the lone-wolf of the army and a head-case for her superiors.

当雪尔森找到了属于自己的战斗理由，不再执着于最强封号的她，反而才展现出真正的实力。

She became the lone-wolf of the army and a head-case for her superiors. 
When Sharice found her own reason to fight and was no longer obsessed with the title of "strongest", she was finally able to display her actual strength.

column1:
太阳王国军中的符文将军，身材性感火辣，战斗实力也属于顶尖程度。却由于天生懒散，加上随心所欲的不受控个性，使得西奥多将她发配边疆作为惩处。

喜爱喝酒与挑逗异性，看见感兴趣的男性就会主动出击，却总是遇不到真爱。

外表看似散漫，但该认真时还是会全力以赴，且会用自己的价值观评断善恶，是位拥有独特个人魅力的美人将军。
column2:
An arcane general from the Kingdom of the Sun. She sports a sexy, luscious figure with top-notch combat abilities that rival her looks. However, her lazy, nonchalant and rebellious personality caused Theodore to banish her to the borders as punishment.

Loves drinking alcohol and seducing the opposite sex. She will actively pursue men who catch her eye, but has yet to find her true love. 

While appearing to be very sloppy, she always lives up to the challenge when things really matter. She also has her own set of values when judging good and evil. Unique, charming and full of personality, her beauty stands out among the rest.

column1:
神秘的羽族，为龙神教派从小培养的密探与杀手。性格多变，时而热情活泼，时而冷艳神秘，兼具宛若贵族一般的高雅与自信。

雪莉先后卧底于符文学院与太阳王国，却于后者任务中爱上了西奥多，并怀上了西奥多的孩子。为了保护腹中的孩子，雪莉选择消失，却引来西奥多的猜忌，最终死在西奥多手下。
column2:
Mysterious member of the feather tribe. A spy and killer raised by the Dracontines since she was a child. Has an ever-changing personality, sometimes cheerful and outgoing, other times cold and mysterious. She has both the grace and confidence similar to that of a noble. 

Shirley was tasked to go undercover in Rune Academy, then Kingdom of the Sun. However, in the latter mission, she fell in love with Theodore and ended up bearing his child. To protect her unborn child, Shirley chose to disappear, but in turn caused Theodore to become suspicious. Utimately, she died at the hands of Theodore.

Mysterious member of the feather tribe. A spy and killer raised by the Dracontines since she was a child. Has an ever-changing personality, sometimes cheerful and outgoing, other times cold and mysterious. She has both the grace and confidence similar to that of a noble. 

Shirley was tasked to go undercover in Rune Academy, then Kingdom of the Sun. However, in the latter mission, she fell in love with Theodore and ended up bearing his child. To protect her unborn child, Shirley chose to disappear, but in turn, caused Theodore to become suspicious. Ultimately, she died at the hands of Theodore.

After Theodore killed Shirley, she became the embodiment of his nightmares. Every night when Theodore tries to sleep, she will appear in his dreams and torment his soul...

column1:
突然出现在纳杰尔与黯月身边的神秘亚人。

外貌可爱，实力高深莫测。脸上总是挂着轻松自信的笑容，实际上心思深沉，个性精明又无法捉摸。偶尔会用笑脸说出令人毛骨悚然的话。

目前为了帮助亚人的未来而跟在纳杰尔身边，给予许多帮助。对纳杰尔有很深的兴趣，却被黯月怀疑不安好心。
column2:
A mysterious demihuman who suddenly appeared in front of Nigel and Yamitsuki. 

Hidden behind the adorable appearance is a being whose strength is simply impossible to predict. Although always found with a relaxing and confident smile, his personality is, in fact, deep, methodical and hard to grasp. Occasionally, he will speak terrifying words that send chills down one's spine while still sporting his trademark smile. 

Right now, he accompanies and assists Nigel for the sake of helping demihumans achieve a better future. Izumi has taken a great interest in Nigel, but Yamitsuki suspects that he's up to something.

column1:
沙漠商会会长，性格严谨认真，安静寡言，讲话习惯条列式说明，对任何人都冷淡以对，脸上也几乎不会表露内心情感。

虽然鲜少人知道，但实际上是特征不明显的鳞族亚人。幼时被西奥多从战场上捡回，成长为如道具一般压抑自我的间谍。

因西奥多的指示潜伏在沙漠市集之中，暗中观察着沙漠王国的动向。
column2:
President of the Chamber of Commerce. Serious, strict and doesn't like to talk. When she does speak, it's in organized bullet points. Has a cold, almost inhospitable attitude towards others. She barely shows any emotion in her expressions as well.

Even though few know about it, she is actually a lizard demihuman with rather concealed lizard features. Found as a child on the battlefield by Theodore, she was raised to be a spy who is more object than person: having little to no personality. 

She is currently undercover at the Desert Bazaar under the orders of Theodore to keep an eye on the Desert Kingdom's actions.

内心起了变化的卡莲，遵循本身的判断而行动，迎向自由意志的风，即将面对崭新的自己。
column2:
President of the Chamber of Commerce. Serious, strict and doesn't like to talk. When she does speak, it's in organized bullet points. Has a cold, almost inhospitable attitude towards others. She barely shows any emotion in her expressions as well.

Even though few know about it, she is actually a lizard demihuman with rather concealed lizard features. Found as a child on the battlefield by Theodore, she was raised to be a spy who is more object than person: having little to no personality. 

She is currently undercover at the Desert Bazaar under the orders of Theodore to keep an eye on the Desert Kingdom's actions. 

After experiencing a change of heart, Karen now acts based on her own decisions. The winds of free will have arrived, and she is ready to embrace her brand-new self.

column1:
符文学院中成绩数一数二的优等生，出生没多久后便被生母托付给了夏尔照顾，被院长夏尔收养为养子。

清冷的外表虽给人高傲冷漠的印象，其实个性认真谨慎、自律甚严，待人接物稳重有礼，是符文学院中少女们憧憬的偶像。

虽然至今都为了获得养父夏尔的认同而努力，但内心对自己的身世一直心存疑惑，私底下不断寻找着相关的线索。
column2:
A top student at Rune Academy. Not long after he was born, his birth mother entrusted him to headmaster Charle. Charle later adopted him as his son.

His cool appearance may give off the impression that he is cold and inhospitable. However, in reality, he has a personality that is careful and earnest. A very self-disciplined person, he is never rude and treats everyone he meets with a great amount of respect. For the young girls of Rune Academy, Elio is the ideal partner they dreamed of having.

For the majority of his life, Elio has worked hard to gain acknowledgment from his foster father, Charle. However, deep down inside, he continues to have questions regarding his own ancestry. Therefore, he has been constantly searching for related clues in private.

A top student at Rune Academy. Not long after he was born, his birth mother entrusted him to headmaster Charle. Charle later adopted him as his son.

A very self-disciplined person, he is never rude and treats everyone he meets with a great amount of respect. For the young girls of Rune Academy, Elio is the ideal partner they dreamed of having.

For the majority of his life, Elio has worked hard to gain acknowledgment from his foster father, Charle. However, deep down inside, he continues to have questions regarding his own ancestry. Therefore, he has been constantly searching for related clues in private.

Upon discovering the truth about his ancestry, Elio awakened as a member of the feather tribe. With such unprecedented powers, his life will never be the same again.

column1:
被西奥多的实验魔法阵召唤来的神秘嘉宾。

黑色人形生物，不会说话，有着长长的手指和白亮的双眼。

为了送爱丽丝回到原本的地方，Deemo弹着钢琴让一株神奇的小树芽不断成长，希望最后能长成一棵通往天空的大树。
对爱丽丝与面具小姐都非常温柔。

这边是镜中的世界。想知道更多的话，请去询问面具小姐吧。
column2:
Mysterious guest summoned by Theodore's experimental magic circle.

A black humanoid creature who doesn't speak a word. Has long fingers and glowing white eyes.

In order to help Alice go back to where she came from, Deemo plays the piano. His music allows a magical seed to keep growing. The hope is that one day, this seed can grow into a massive tree that reaches the skies. He is very kind to both Alice and the Masked Girl.

This is the world inside the mirror. If you want to know more, please go ask the Masked Girl.

column1:
被西奥多的实验魔法阵召唤来的神秘嘉宾。

可爱的小女孩，自天窗坠入到神秘的树屋世界，与奇特的人形生物Deemo相遇。聪明而坚强，好奇心旺盛，有点调皮。失去记忆的她努力地想回到天上的窗口。

这边是镜中的世界。想知道更多的话，请去询问面具小姐吧。
column2:
Mysterious guest summoned by Theodore's experimental magic circle.

An adorable little girl who fell into the mysterious treehouse from a skylight and encountered the peculiar humanoid creature Deemo. Smart, determined, curious about everything and is also a little bit mischievous. Despite losing her memory, she is still working hard to return to the window in the sky. 

This is the world inside the mirror. If you want to know more, please go ask the Masked Girl.

找回Mirai的爱丽丝，换上了那件怀念的洋装，终于想起了非常重要的事......

column1:
被西奥多的实验魔法阵召唤来的神秘嘉宾。

戴着毫无表情的苍白面具，对于树屋世界中的一切似乎了若指掌，被召唤来后也是三位嘉宾中最冷静的。

对爱丽丝并不友善，用尽各种手段，想要阻止爱丽丝回到天窗外的世界。不过不知为何，面具小姐却很听Deemo的话。

面具小姐随身携带的怀表内侧，刻着一句不显眼的文字：“yrasrevinna ht5”。
column2:
Mysterious guest summoned by Theodore's experimental magic circle.

Wears a snowy white mask that shows no emotion. Seems to know everything about the treehouse and the world surrounding it. She is also the calmest one among the three summoned guests.

Not exactly friendly to Alice. She uses all kinds of methods to prevent Alice from returning to the world beyond the skylight. However, for some unknown reason, the Masked Girl always behaves herself whenever Deemo is around.

The Masked Girl carries a pocket watch with her all the time. A concealed message is carved on the inside of the pocket watch:
"yrasrevinna ht5".

column1:
曾辅佐威廉王的军师尼古拉之弟子，在尼古拉死后，继承其遗志，继续于晴空草原村庄的私塾，教导贫困的孩童读书，深受村民的信赖。

足智多谋，处事应对冷静自持，总是以温和的笑容待人，鲜少表露出激烈的情绪。所说的话有时半真半假，有所保留，令人猜不透其心思。

在太阳王国内战中，成为炎日军团的军师，为安洁莉亚效力。
column2:
Disciple of Nikola, the strategist who once served the late King William. After Nikola passed away, Hyde followed his master's dying wish and inherited the small school in a Paradise Prairie village. He taught poor children and was deeply trusted by the villagers. 

Wise and resourceful, he handles issues in a calm and restrained manner. He always greets people with a gentle smile and very rarely displays strong emotions. Occasionally,  his speech appears to be a mix of lies and truths, like he is keeping something to himself, thus making it hard to read his thoughts. 

After the Kingdom of the Sun civil war broke out, he became the strategist for Sunshine Infantry and served under Angelia.

column1:
曾辅佐威廉王的军师尼古拉之弟子，在尼古拉死后，继承其遗志，继续于晴空草原村庄的私塾，教导贫困的孩童读书，深受村民的信赖。

足智多谋，处事应对冷静自持，总是以温和的笑容待人，鲜少表露出激烈的情绪。所说的话有时半真半假，有所保留，令人猜不透其心思。

在太阳王国内战中，成为炎日军团的军师，为安洁莉亚效力。
column2:
Disciple of Nikola, the strategist who once served the late King William. After Nikola passed away, Hyde followed his master's dying wish and inherited the small school in a Paradise Prairie village. He taught poor children and was deeply trusted by the villagers. 

Wise and resourceful, he handles issues in a calm and restrained manner. He always greets people with a gentle smile and very rarely displays strong emotions. Occasionally,  his speech appears to be a mix of lies and truths, like he is keeping something to himself, thus making it hard to read his thoughts. 

After the Kingdom of the Sun civil war broke out, he became the strategist for Sunshine Infantry and served under Angelia.

曾辅佐威廉王的军师尼古拉之弟子，在尼古拉死后，继承其遗志，继续于晴空草原村庄的私塾，教导贫困的孩童读书，深受村民的信赖。

在太阳王国内战中，成为炎日军团的军师，为安洁莉亚效力。

深受裂隙病所苦，想改变自身命运的海德，他眼中所看见的，究竟是什么样的景象呢？
column2:
Disciple of Nikola, the strategist who once served the late King William. After Nikola passed away, Hyde followed his master's dying wish and inherited the small school in a Paradise Prairie village. He taught poor children and was deeply trusted by the villagers. 

Wise and resourceful, he handles issues in a calm and restrained manner. He always greets people with a gentle smile and very rarely displays strong emotions. Occasionally,  his speech appears to be a mix of lies and truths, like he is keeping something to himself, thus making it hard to read his thoughts. 

After the Kingdom of the Sun civil war broke out, he became the strategist for Sunshine Infantry and served under Angelia. 

Suffering from void disease, Hyde is desperate to change his own destiny. The images he saw with his eye, what are they exactly?

column1:
离乡背井以来，在庞的心中，使家族没落的责任、让挚友死亡的悔恨，压得庞喘不过气。

原本只是夜深人静时受此折磨，这份痛苦却在不知不觉中化为黑暗的幻影，侵蚀了庞的心智，甚至渐渐演变为耳边细语，化为真实巨大的形体。

庞的幻影仿佛有了自己的意志与思想，在庞空虚寂寞，孤身一人时，不断地指责他的过失、诉说着力量的伟大。庞的心灵逐渐被幻影反噬，陷入了前所未有的迷惑与挣扎。

深夜，一个神似庞的黑影站在他的面前。庞不知那究竟是内心疯狂的化身，或者就是真实的自己。

那黑影看着迷惘的庞，露出了渴望力量，狰狞而狂诞的笑容……
column2:
Ever since he was expelled from home, Pang's heart never had a moment of peace. 

The responsibility of causing his tribe's decline, the regret of letting his best friend die, all those emotions tormented Pang. At first, the suffering only occurred late at night. However, slowly but surely, this torment took shape as a dark phantom and began corrupting Pang's mind. 

Moreover, this phantom gradually evolved into whispers in his ear and became a physical, imposing figure. It was as if it developed a will and thoughts of its own. When Pang was feeling empty and lonely, this phantom would constantly scold him for his mistakes and preach to him the greatness of power. The phantom was slowly devouring Pang's mind, putting him in a state of unimaginable confusion and struggle.

In the middle of the night, a shadow that looks identical to Pang is standing in front of him. Pang has no idea whether it's the embodiment of the insanity in his heart or his actual real self. 

The shadow looks at the puzzled Pang and makes a smile, a twisted, savage, power-hungry smile...

column1:
◆比庞更青春
◆比庞更魁梧
◆CV：稻田彻 （比庞更悦耳）
column2:
◆ Younger than Pang
◆ Bulkier than Pang
◆ CV: Inada Tetsu (More cheery than Pang)

column1:
隶属于芙蕾莉卡‧路西翁麾下的副官。虽然年轻但性格严谨，思想古板，不懂何谓幽默。

对工作丝毫不马虎，以身为太阳王国军的一员为荣。个性认真又爱操心，成天不是替懒散的芙蕾莉卡收拾残局擦屁股，就是被她耍得团团转到处奔波，因此对芙蕾莉卡极度不信任。

这样紧绷的关系虽然近来有了好转的趋势，但依旧过着为芙蕾莉卡劳心劳力的每一天。
column2:
An officer who serves under the direct command of Fredrica Lucien. Even though he is young, he has quite a rigorous personality. Pair that with an old-fashioned way of thinking and you get someone who has zero sense of humor. 

He takes great pride in the fact that he's a member of the Kingdom army. Thus, he is never sloppy when it comes to his work. A serious and constantly worrying guy, his time at work often comes down to two things: Either forced to clean up the messes, sometimes straight-up chaos, for the lazy Fredrica or get dragged around in circles by her wacky shenanigans. Because of this, he really doesn't trust Fredrica 

Although this tense relationship has been improving recently, he still spends his days toiling and worrying for Fredrica.

在与芙蕾莉卡关系缓和下来后，收到了一个意外的礼物。虽然容易引人侧目，但杰罗姆还是会在重要场合披戴这件​​芙蕾莉卡特别订制的披风。
column2:

Because of this, he really doesn't trust Fredrica 

Although this tense relationship has been improving recently, he still spends his days toiling and worrying for Fredrica.

After his relationship with Fredrica began to ease up, he received a surprise gift. Even though he tends to raise quite a few eyebrows when he wears it, on any formal occasion, Jerome would still don the cape that Fredrica custom-made for him.

column1:
图腾塔夫中的一名看守兵。

善良热心、行动缓慢、想法单纯憨直，跟聪明二字完全沾不上边，因此常常被同族的伙伴们捉弄瞧不起，在熊族也只从事看守兵这种简单的工作。虽然工作上时常出包招惹麻烦，但运气极佳，最后总能小兵立大功，完美收场。

迟钝憨厚的他还有位令众熊称羡的美丽妻子，享用丰盛美味的爱妻便当是他每天最幸福的时光，彻底贯彻了傻熊有傻福的道理。
column2:
A Bear guard stationed in Totemtaff. 

Though kind-hearted and earnest, he's rather slow, literally and figuratively. An honest and simple fellow, "smart" is not a word anyone would associate with him. Because of this, he is often teased and looked down upon by his Bear comrades, and is only assigned basic jobs such as guard duty. He constantly screws up and gets in trouble during his job. However, he's unbelievably lucky and always manages to somehow save the day in the end. Despite his problems, things tend to turn out just fine for him.
 
On top of that, he also has a beautiful wife who is the envy of all Bears. Enjoying the sumptuous and tasty boxed lunch prepared by his wife is the happiest moment for him every day. He is the living embodiment of the idiom "Fortune favors fools."

column1:
符文学院研究生兼助教的探险家夏尔（自称），年轻有活力，满腔热血，对太阳王国外的世界充满好奇，尤其热衷研究古文明。因此夏尔时常独自带着他所制造的符文道具「猫头鹰号」，前往世界各国探险，足迹几乎跑遍了整个凡泰缇大陆！

探险家夏尔造访过失落的国度、挖掘出古代符文、潜入充满机关的神秘遗迹、解决魔物引发的恐怖危机等……所到之处必会引发事件！

不过勇往直前的夏尔太过单纯莽撞，在探险时也吃过不少苦，挨饿受冻更是家常便饭，也许如今「特殊」的味觉，就是年轻时探险的经历所培养出来的吧！
column2:
Rune Academy graduate student and teaching assistant. A self-proclaimed explorer, he's young, energetic and filled with passion. Curious about the world outside of Kingdom of the Sun, he is especially keen about researching ancient civilizations. Because of this, Charle often takes his self-made rune item, Owl Boy, on solo expeditions to various regions, covering almost all of continent Vendacti.

Charle the explorer has visited fallen kingdoms, dug out ancient runes, snuck into trap-filled hidden ruins, dealt with horrifying crises caused by monsters, and more... Wherever he goes, strange incidents always seem to follow. 

However, the brave, young Charle was rather simple-minded and reckless. He encountered many difficult experiences during his adventures and hungry, freezing nights were a regular occurrence. Perhaps his current "unique" taste in food is a product of all that adventuring during his younger days.

◆ 23 yrs old (15th of Maple month)
◆ 174 cm
◆ CV: Shinnosuke Tachibana

column1:
符文学院的助教，与夏尔同期的研究学者。才华洋溢，同时也是学院内「生命学派」的核心人物。

以「天才」自称，但在其研究领域中也确实是公认的天才，认为那些需要「努力」与「勤劳」的人都是笨蛋而不屑一顾。

个性自负自恋、脾气暴躁容易不耐烦、行动大胆毫不在意周遭的事物，只对自己的研究、或对研究派得上用场的人感兴趣。

身为符文学院的助教，全心全意投入「生命学派」的研究领域，同时将「实用学派」的夏尔‧瑟雷斯当作竞争对手，执着地想与之一较高下。
column2:
An assistant professor at the Rune Academy, and a scholar from the same period as Charle. His natural abilities well surpass his peers, and he's the leader of the Academy's Life Magic department. 

He calls himself a genius, and indeed he's recognized as one in his specific field of research. He thinks that people who require "hard work" and "diligence" are actually idiots deserving of his mockery.

Conceited and narcissistic, Morris is prone to outbursts of anger and easily irritated. He's ballsy with his actions and disregards how his actions affect those around him. The only things that interest him are his own research and those who are useful to his research. 

As an assistant professor at the Rune Academy, he is completely absorbed in the research of Life Magic. He takes Charle, a frontrunner in the field of Applied Magic, as his scholarly nemesis and is determined to prove himself as the superior one.

◆ 20 yrs old (2nd of Frost month)
◆ 172 cm
◆ CV: Midorikawa Hikaru

◆ 172 cm
◆ CV: Midorikawa Hikaru

column1:
符文学院的教师，与夏尔同期的研究学者。天赋过人、才华横溢，同时也是学院内「生命学派」的领导人物。

以「天才」自称，但在其研究领域中也确实是公认的天才，认为那些需要「努力」与「勤劳」的人都是笨蛋而不屑一顾。

个性自负自恋、脾气暴躁容易不耐烦、行动大胆毫不在意周遭的事物，只对自己的研究、或对研究派得上用场的人感兴趣。因而赏识有天分的学生奥斯塔，对其细心栽培。

起初将「实用学派」的夏尔当作竞争对手，在经历一场事故后化敌为友，为了共同的目标而合作。

成为教师的莫里斯，在生命学派的研究中有了重大突破。他所改造的特殊符文生物，是战斗与探索时最得力的帮手。
column2:
An assistant professor at the Rune Academy, and a scholar from the same period as Charle. His natural abilities well surpass his peers, and he's the leader of the Academy's Life Magic department. 

He calls himself a genius, and indeed he's recognized as one in his specific field of research. He thinks that people who require "hard work" and "diligence" are actually idiots deserving of his mockery.

Conceited and narcissistic, Morris is prone to outbursts of anger and easily irritated. He's ballsy with his actions and disregards how his actions affect those around him. The only things that interest him are his own research and those who are useful to his research. 

As an assistant professor at the Rune Academy, he is completely absorbed in the research of Life Magic. He takes Charle, a frontrunner in the field of Applied Magic, as his scholarly nemesis and is determined to prove himself as the superior one.

After becoming a professor, Morris had a breakthrough in the field of Life Magic. The Rune creatures he created are his most powerful assistants on both the battlefield and during his explorations.

◆ 27 yrs old (2nd of Frost month)
◆ 172 cm
◆ CV: Hikaru Midorikawa

column1:
摩根马戏团现任团长，活泼有朝气、待人友好、喜欢帮助别人，脸上总是挂着开朗的笑容。为了不让身边的人们担心，习惯不将心事轻易说出来。

父母从小离异，因此一直跟着经营马戏团的父亲摩根过着不安定的日子。虽然不谅解父亲，却又深受其影响。

在父亲意外死后，接管马戏团团长，继续带着身体有缺陷的团员们，前往有战乱或灾祸的地方巡回演出，将欢乐与笑容散播到大陆的每个角落。
column2:
Ringmaster of Morgan's Marvelous Circus, she's lively and energetic. She likes to help others and always has a bright smile on her face. She is reluctant to speak what's on her mind so as not to make others worry. 

Her parents divorced early on, so she lived an unstable life following her father Morgan around in the circus that he ran. Even though she never understood or forgave her father, she was still deeply affected by him. 

After her father died in an accident, she took over as Ringmaster of the circus. She continued taking her band of misfits to places suffering from war and natural disasters, determined to spread smiles and happiness to every corner of the continent.

◆17 yrs old (27th of Frost month)
◆158 cm
◆CV: Kayano Ai

column1:
自有记忆起就被奴隶贩子卖到沙漠王国，培养成战士型奴隶。高大勇猛，擅长战斗。

历任主人皆是看中他的身体能力，却从未把他当正常人对待，造成他奔跑时惯用四足步行，不善言词，表达能力如孩童一般。需要听从主人的命令行事，习惯一个指令一个动作，没有自身善恶判断的标准。

乍看之下极为凶狠，但其实本性忠厚老实、胸无城府。身上有许多奴隶时期被鞭打留下的伤疤。
column2:
For as long as Rune can remember, he has been a slave. He was sold to the Desert Kingdom by a slave trader and was raised as a slave warrior. Fierce and large in stature, he's an expert in battle. 

Since his multiple masters have only ever valued his physical abilities and never see him as a real human being, he is used to running on all fours and possesses communication skills akin to that of a child. He requires a command from his master to do anything and lacks the ability to distinguish between good and evil. 

At first glance, he appears to be a fierce beast, but in reality, he is loyal, sincere and kindhearted. On his body remain many scars, a result of the lashes he received during his time as a slave.

column2:
For as long as Rune can remember, he has been a slave. He was sold to the Desert Kingdom by a slave trader and was raised as a slave warrior. Fierce and large in stature, he's an expert in battle. 

Since his multiple masters have only ever valued his physical abilities and never see him as a real human being, he is used to running on all fours and possesses communication skills akin to that of a child. He requires a command from his master to do anything and lacks the ability to distinguish between good and evil. 

At first glance, he appears to be a fierce beast, but in reality, he is loyal, sincere and kindhearted. On his body remain many scars, a result of the lashes he received during his time as a slave.

After throwing off his slave identity, Rune has gradually gotten used to taking action without any orders. He now has a childlike vision for the future and has finally found the things he wants to treasure.

column1:
沙漠王国的大神官，性格古板，对蛇神信仰无比虔诚的蛇兽人。

地位崇高，连王室贵族都要礼让三分。作为神职人员的最高领导者，主掌各种祭典、传递蛇神意旨与庇佑。

虽然思想守旧不知变通，但仍一心为了神殿与人民的福祉着想。私底下捐助着孤儿院，比谁都关心沙漠王国的未来。只是年岁渐长，近来对于神殿内外的冲突，渐渐感到力不从心。
column2:
The High Priest of the Desert Kingdom, his personality is extremely old-fashioned. Regarding the worship of the Snake God, there's no snake more devout than he. 

Holding a highly esteemed position, even the nobility treat him with the utmost respect. As the most powerful religious leader, he presides over important sacrificial ceremonies and transmits both the Snake God's wishes and blessings.

Although he is extremely conservative in his thinking, he nonetheless holds the well-being of the shrine and the people as fundamentally important. His concern for the future of the Desert Kingdom is unparalleled, shown by his private donations to a Desert orphanage. Recently, due to his increasing age, he has not been as capable of addressing the internal and external conflicts of the shrine as he would like.

column1:
沙漠王国的大神官，性格古板，对蛇神信仰无比虔诚的蛇兽人。

地位崇高，连王室贵族都要礼让三分。作为神职人员的最高领导者，主掌各种祭典、传递蛇神意旨与庇佑。

因理念与行事作风与女王黛安娜有歧异，率领神殿与沙漠王室分庭抗礼。从孤儿院收养米莎后，将其培育成母蛇神转世的圣女，借此抬高了神​​殿的声望。

近年来神殿与王室的争斗愈演愈烈，一触即发的气氛弥漫了整个王国。利用米莎与王室处处针锋相对的戴菲斯，手段也渐渐不同以往……
column2:
The High Priest of the Desert Kingdom, his personality is extremely old-fashioned. Regarding the worship of the Snake God, there's no snake more devout than he. 

Holding a highly esteemed position, even the nobility treat him with the utmost respect. As the most powerful religious leader, he presides over important sacrificial ceremonies and transmits both the Snake God's wishes and blessings.

Although he is extremely conservative in his thinking, he nonetheless holds the well-being of the shrine and the people as fundamentally important. His concern for the future of the Desert Kingdom is unparalleled, shown by his private donations to a Desert orphanage. Recently, due to his increasing age, he has not been as capable of addressing the internal and external conflicts of the shrine as he would like.

The past several years have seen the dispute between the Holy Shrine and the Royal Court raised to a fevered pitch, affecting the atmosphere of the entire kingdom. Pitting Misa against the Royal Court at any chance he gets, his methods are gradually changing from what they once were...

column1:
沙漠王国蛇神信仰的圣女，蛇亚人。原为孤儿，被大神官戴菲斯发现其特殊的力量，而被选为神殿圣女。

纯真无邪，为自己神圣的身分感到自豪，有着想救济信徒的高洁心灵与使命感。身体虽然虚弱，却拥有奇迹般的治愈能力，因而被传诵为母蛇神转世。加上大神官戴菲斯刻意扶植，因此深受人民爱戴，使神殿的威望更胜沙漠王室。

对蛇神信仰无比虔诚，一旦遇到亵渎蛇神、冒犯自己的人会感到备受羞辱，愤怒异常。
column2:
A snake demi-human regarded in the Desert Kingdom as the Holy Maiden of the Snake God religion. Previously an orphan, she was chosen by the High Priest Devious to be the Holy Maiden of the Holy Shrine after he discovered her special abilities. Pure and innocent, she is proud of her sacred position and has the noble heart and sense of duty to support her faithful followers. 

Although her body is weak and frail, she possesses a miraculous healing ability, which is what leads the faithful to see her as the reincarnation of the Snake Goddess. With the deliberate backing of the High Priest Devious, she became beloved amongst the people. This caused the prestige of the Holy Shrine to surpass that of the Desert Kingdom's Royal Court.

Her devotion to the Snake God is beyond measure; if she encounters blasphemy against him or is herself crossed, the offender will suffer unparalleled humiliation and wrath.

◆9 yrs old (4th of Mist month)
◆130 cm
◆CV: Naganawa Maria

column2:
A snake demi-human regarded in the Desert Kingdom as the Holy Maiden of the Snake God religion. Previously an orphan, she was chosen by the High Priest Devious to be the Holy Maiden of the Holy Shrine after he discovered her special abilities. Pure and innocent, she is proud of her sacred position and has the noble heart and sense of duty to support her faithful followers. 

Although her body is weak and frail, she possesses a miraculous healing ability, which is what leads the faithful to see her as the reincarnation of the Snake Goddess. Her devotion to the Snake God is beyond measure; if she encounters blasphemy against him or is herself crossed, the offender will suffer unparalleled humiliation and wrath. Her identity as the Holy Maiden and her miraculous healing powers are everything to Misa. Her desire to help the people is, without an inkling of doubt, sincere and heartfelt.

column1:
来自东方联邦的鳖兽人，个性消极没自信，遇到麻烦总是第一个逃跑。

作为交换留学生来到沙漠王国，因故被退学却没颜面回去家乡。借住在好心的蜥蜴人家中，使用来自东方联邦的基础气脉之术，靠着说书杂技、卖零食讨生活，而成了市集港口等地的杂耍艺人。

虽是鳖兽人却长得像乌龟，对于自我的定位感到迷惘。靠着嘻皮笑脸、装傻耍宝来炒热气氛，以换取众人的掌声与讥笑，借此逃避许多纷争。其实心性善良，到了紧要关头，万不得已时还是会勉强出手帮助别人。
column2:
A tortoise beast from the East Alliance who is passive and lacks confidence. Whenever he gets into trouble, he's always the first one running. 

Originally an exchange student in the Desert Kingdom, after he got kicked out of school, he couldn't find the courage to go home and face his family. Currently staying with kind-hearted Lizards, he relies on various "skills" he learned back home to help him scrounge together enough money to live. Whether it's singing, dancing, rhyming, story-telling or selling, he does it all. His unusual performing style has made him a staple at the Bazaar, Harbor, and other spots in the Kingdom.

Although he's actually a tortoise, many people mistake him for a turtle. Confused about his place in society, he relies on his strange looks, slapstick humor and smooth talking to garner applause and laughter from the audience. His unique set of skills also often help him get out of trouble. In reality, he is very kindhearted, and when it is absolutely necessary he forces himself to lend a hand to those in need.

◆18 yrs old (10th of Sun Month)
◆159cm
◆CV: Yuuichi Ishigami

◆23 yrs old (10th of Sun Month)
◆159cm
◆CV: Yuuichi Ishigami

column1:
来自东方联邦的狼兽人。孔武有力，气势逼人，是在一族中有着崇高地位的武术大师。

平时表面谦和爱好和平，常劝人向善；实际上本性火爆易怒，一旦生气翻脸便会不顾后果地冲动行事。但坏脾气来得快去得也快，总在事后对于自己的冲动感到后悔，不断重复着这样的过程，因此一直寻求着内心的平静。

平时虽常与弟子米兰达拌嘴吵吵闹闹，但其实师徒感情甚笃。与枫湖畔的扬波是多年未见的旧识。
column2:
A herculean, wolf beast from the East Alliance who is a renowned martial arts master within his tribe. 

Usually, he is humble, peace-loving, and encourages others to be virtuous. Try as he may, he can't hide the fact that in reality, he is explosive and short-tempered. He often lets his true nature get the best of him and will explode with complete disregard for the consequences. But as fast as his rage comes it goes, leaving him regretful and bewildered about his actions. This process is constantly repeating itself, causing him to continue to search for inner peace.

Although he is always quarreling with his disciple Miranda, their teacher-student relationship is exceptionally deep. He is a long-time friend of Yan-Bo's from his days in Maple Lake, though they haven't seen each other for quite some time.

◆44 yrs old (1st of Maple Month)
◆200cm
◆CV: Kushida Yasumichi

来自东方联邦的狼兽人。孔武有力，气势逼人，是在一族中有着崇高地位的武术大师。

嘴里数完一、二、三……理智断线后的洛在将对方打到满地找牙前，是谁也无法阻止的狂徒。
column2:
A herculean, wolf beast from the East Alliance who is a renowned martial arts master within his tribe. 

Usually, he is humble, peace-loving, and encourages others to be virtuous. Try as he may, he can't hide the fact that in reality, he is explosive and short-tempered. He often lets his true nature get the best of him and will explode with complete disregard for the consequences. After counting down from three...Law's ability to think rationally explodes and he'll beat down his opponent until their teeth fall out. When he gets in a rage, there's no one who's able to hold him back.

◆44 yrs old (1st of Maple Month)
◆200cm
◆CV: Kushida Yasumichi

◆44 yrs old (1st of Maple Month)
◆200cm
◆CV: Kushida Yasumichi

column1:
绿色，心旷神怡的绿色。
相较青葱草原的广大，湖底世界多了份神秘斑斓。

新的邂逅，新的伙伴，是敌人还是朋友？
为了守护女王的笑容，她与它将并肩作战。一场力与美，香汗淋漓的赛事即将展开。

那年夏天，刺刺黏黏、湿湿软软的不明生物，正是娜雅挥之不去的季夏邂逅……
column2:
Emerald, free as the rolling hills. Imagine the vast, lush prairies, the mysterious colors beneath the surface of the lake. 

A new chance encounter, a new partner...is it a friend or foe? 
To protect the smile on the Queen's face, she fights alongside her new partner. A soaking wet battle that's exciting and stimulating is about to unfold. 

On that summer day, the encounter with a sticky, wet creature is something Naya will never forget...

◆ 25 yrs old (1st of Snow month)
◆ 172 cm
◆ CV: Hisakawa Aya

column1:
粉色，生命力的粉红色。
那是青涩逐渐趋向成熟的象征。

并非不善水性，但什么也比不上与新朋友一同戏水来得有趣。
为了盛大款待众人，新朋友带来那源源不绝的点心、酸甜滋味的冰凉果汁，成为大家的活力泉源。

那年夏天，与新朋友一期一会的相遇与分离，是雪尔森不愿承认，却又长大了一点的证明……
column2:
Pink, the color of new life, of rosy cheeks. The symbol of young life blossoming into its prime.

She's a decent swimmer, so for her, nothing beats having fun with her friends in the water. In order to graciously treat everyone, she brought a snack that's become the source of all their power; an icy, sweet and sour, freshly squeezed juice. 

Though she won't admit it, the short time she spent with her friends that summer vacation is proof that Sharice has grown just a little bit...

◆ 18 yrs old (25th of Dew month)
◆ 149 cm
◆ CV: Kugimiya Rie

column1:
紫色，典雅的淡紫色。
卸下女王的身分与重担，此处是只属于她与她们的秘密乐园。

初次的远游、初次的戏水，蒙上双眼，是未知的世界。
为了不辜负众人的心意，要尽情欢笑嬉闹，创造闪亮的夏日光年。

那年夏天，她们的珍贵回忆，是埋藏在安洁莉亚心中，最闪耀的那颗宝石……
column2:
Purple, elegant and royal. Putting down her status and responsibilities as the Queen, this place is a secret playground that only belongs to them. 

Her first time traveling (for fun) and her first time playing in the water; with her eyes blindfolded, this is a whole new world for her. To live up to everyone's expectations, she's got to have so much fun her heart explodes. That way, she'll light up the summer for everybody.

That summer day, the memory that they all cherish lives in the heart of Angelia, the most radiant jewel of them all...

◆ 20 yrs old (16th of Dew month)
◆ 165 cm
◆ CV: Amamiya Sora

column1:
白色，高洁的白色。
适水性与延展性极佳的布料，前所未有的崭新战服。

在冰凉湖水中来去自如。瞄准，狙击，伺机而动。
为了捍卫女王的假期，拾起戏水之枪，那湖畔正是另一个战场。

那年夏天，留下镇湖之枪名号而去的希欧，已成为枫湖畔的逸闻，将继续流传下去……
column2:
White, pure as snow. A fabric that's fit for the water and flexible at that, it's ready for any battle that lies ahead. 

In the crisp, cool lake water she moves as she pleases. Aim, fire, wait for the next shot... To protect the Queen's vacation, she's raising her water gun in service. The lake is the sight of the next battle. 

That summer day, Sione the sharpshooter made her name known on the shores of Maple Lake. The legends surrounding her have continued ever since...

◆ 22 yrs old (6th of Ice month)
◆ 168 cm
◆ CV: Kawasumi Ayako

column1:
来历不明，推测是来自机械疆域的机器人。装载一定武力，却因故障而遗忘&͠҉͜͟͜*̴̵̨͜͜%̶҉^̶̀͢͏$́̕!͏̵͠͝͝ ̴̵̧̕͟)̕͏͜(̷̢̀*̨̀!͏̛$̧́͞^̨̛͞&҉͏͘͜@̨̕#͠͝ ̴̨͟͠͝*̴́&̵͘的机密任务。活力旺盛，像新生的雏鸟一样单纯，对世界充满好奇心，不懂何谓猜忌或怀疑。

因不明原因漂流到沙漠王国的港口边，被当作垃圾丢弃在路旁。正巧路过的克拉克将其暂时修复，但偶尔还是会发生当机的状况。缺乏一般常识也不懂人情世故，因此常常闹出不少惊吓与笑话。

非常喜爱克拉克，以及克拉克所制的符文小鸟啾啾，将克拉克视作重要的主人而一路跟随着他。
column2:
Though her history is unclear, it's been said that she comes from the Mechanical Territory. Though she is pre-programmed with fighting abilities, due to a malfunction, she's forgotten Secret Mission: &͠҉͜͟͜*̴̵̨͜͜%̶҉^̶̀͢͏$́̕!͏̵͠͝͝ ̴̵̧̕͟)̕͏͜(̷̢̀*̨̀!͏̛$̧́͞^̨̛͞&҉͏͘͜@̨̕#͠͝ ̴̨͟͠͝*̴́&̵͘. Her personality is that of an innocent toddler, with an immense curiosity regarding the world around her. She possesses abundant energy and has yet to understand jealousy, doubt, and other negative human emotions.

For some unknown reason, she floated to the harbor of the Desert Kingdom. Originally, she was considered trash and tossed to the side. Luckily, Clark happened to be passing by, and as an expert in Rune items was able to repair her. However, her system still occasionally crashes, causing problems mostly for Clark. She lacks common sense and an understanding of inter-personal issues, causing her to both shock and delight those around her.

Maria especially loves Clark and the Rune powered bird that he created, Chu Chu.  She takes Clark to be her primary master and follows him wherever he goes.

在遭遇重大故障后，被重启的玛莉亚，恢复了属于她的真正面貌，成为不知感情为何物的冰冷机器。
column2:
Though her history is unclear, it's been said that she comes from the Mechanical Territory. Luckily, Clark happened to be passing by, and as an expert in Rune items was able to repair her. However, her system still occasionally crashes, causing problems mostly for Clark. She lacks common sense and an understanding of inter-personal issues, causing her to both shock and delight those around her.

Maria especially loves Clark and the Rune powered bird that he created, Chu Chu.  She takes Clark to be her primary master and follows him wherever he goes.

Following a serious malfunction, Maria was restarted and her true self was restored; a cold-hearted robot who has absolutely no understanding of emotions.

column1:
无论跑到何处，逃往哪里，鲜血的腥味都呛得使人作呕。艳丽的枫红似血，以及面无表情的狐狸亚人，是遇上泉的人们在死前最后所看见的光景。

泉是何时出现在东方联邦中的？像是突然造访的一场腥风血雨，浸染了东方的大地。当人们注意到时，他早已将东方联邦各种族的诸多机密捏在掌心之中。

十个，二十个，一百个……多到连他自己也糊涂了。手上的太刀到底染过多少人的鲜血，除了他自己，能够回答的人也都不在了。

泉潜伏在东方联邦，为龙神教派带去无数关于联邦内部的情报。执行着漫长且乏味的任务，「有没有更好玩的任务，更有趣的人呢？」边喃喃自语边抽出太刀的泉，终于在不久后，收到了关于亚特拉斯新任务的消息……
column2:
No matter where he goes, the smell of fresh blood inevitably causes those nearby to vomit. A stunning maple red, like the color of blood, and the emotionless expression of a demihuman fox are the last images one who encounters Izumi sees just before perishing.

When did Izumi appear in the East Alliance? It was as if a whirlwind of blood and gore had paid a visit to the East Alliance and infected the land. By the time people had noticed, he had already held the secrets of the various tribes in the palm of his hand.

10, 20, 100...even he is fuzzy on how many have fallen. How much blood has been spilled by that blade? Besides himself, those who may have had the answer are long gone.

Izumi lies in wait in the East Alliance, gathering reports concerning the inner workings of the East Alliance for the Dracontines. Carrying out this long and tedious mission, he often mutters to himself as he pulls out his blade, "Aren't there any more interesting missions? More interesting people?" Finally, after some time, he's received news that there's a new mission that concerns Atlas......

column1:
◆猩红的十七岁（枫月三十日）
◆160cm
◆CV：植田佳奈
column2:
◆ 17 yrs old (30th of Maple month)
◆ 160 cm
◆CV: Ueda Kana

column1:
原为太阳王国的士兵被俘，受尽折磨后死里逃生，后成为沙漠王国的战士，一路爬升到将军的位子。忠心地辅佐女王黛安娜，与神殿势力水火不容，相互制衡。

武力高强，个性阴郁，浑身散发着肃杀之气，王国中除了女王黛安娜，极少有人敢接近其身。不轻易表露情感，心思难以捉摸，亦正亦邪、心志坚韧，为达目的不择手段，而成了在沙漠王国中人人畏惧的存在。
column2:
Originally a captive of the Kingdom of the Sun serving as a soldier for the Kingdom. After having had enough, he fled for his life and became a warrior for the Desert Kingdom, making his way up the ranks until he eventually became general. Faithfully serving as Queen Diana’s right-hand man, they are always in conflict with the power of the Holy Shrine, with both parties balancing out the other. 
 
With exceptional fighting abilities and a gloomy demeanor, the aura of solemn death exudes from his body. Besides the Queen, no one dares approach him. Lazer rarely expresses his emotions and his thoughts are nearly impossible to grasp. No one is sure if he is evil or good, but everyone agrees his will is determined and tenacious. To reach his goals, he will not stop at anything and has become one to fear in the minds of those who live in the Desert Kingdom.

原为太阳王国的士兵被俘，受尽折磨后死里逃生，后成为沙漠王国的战士，一路爬升到将军的位子。忠心地辅佐女王黛安娜，与神殿势力水火不容，相互制衡。

武力高强，个性阴郁，浑身散发着肃杀之气，王国中除了女王黛安娜，极少有人敢接近其身。不轻易表露情感，心思难以捉摸，亦正亦邪、心志坚韧，为达目的不择手段，而成了在沙漠王国中人人畏惧的存在。

爬上沙漠王国大将军之位的雷萨，同时也化身为守护女王黛安娜，最黑暗的影子……
column2:
Originally a captive of the Kingdom of the Sun serving as a soldier for the Kingdom. After having had enough, he fled for his life and became a warrior for the Desert Kingdom, making his way up the ranks until he eventually became general. Faithfully serving as Queen Diana’s right-hand man, they are always in conflict with the power of the Holy Shrine, with both parties balancing out the other. 
 
With exceptional fighting abilities and a gloomy demeanor, the aura of solemn death exudes from his body. Besides the Queen, no one dares approach him. Lazer rarely expresses his emotions and his thoughts are nearly impossible to grasp. No one is sure if he is evil or good, but everyone agrees his will is determined and tenacious. To reach his goals, he will not stop at anything and has become one to fear in the minds of those who live in the Desert Kingdom. 

Lazer has not only climbed to the rank of general, he also serves as both the primary protector for Queen Diana, and her darkest shadow...

◆23 yrs old（9th of Ice month） 
◆178cm 
◆CV：Okiayu Ryōtarō

◆30 yrs old（9th of Ice month） 
◆178cm 
◆CV：Okiayu Ryōtarō

◆41 yrs old（9th of Ice month） 
◆178cm 
◆CV：Okiayu Ryōtarō

column1:
身为龙神教派的密探，雪莉──不，或许该称她为奥罗拉。奥罗拉的占卜有九成的命中率，她的占星就是如此准确……或者该说，她能够「让」结果如此的准确。

毫不意外地，人们在未知的命运面前毫无防备，不计代价渴求着对未来的一丝丝指引。聪明机智，兼具洞察力的奥罗拉利用她的话术与美貌，周游各国，穿梭在权贵人士之间，用神秘的占星术与各种暗示性的话语，打听到了所有她想得到的情报。

在替人占卜之后，奥罗拉心血来潮地为自己预测了一次未来。那繁星所隐现的银发身影与鲜红色的自己，被她嗤之以鼻抛诸脑后。等雪莉回忆起那幕时，已经是很久很久之后的事情了……
column2:
A secret spy sent by the Dracontines, Shirley's──no, Aurora's fortune tellings are 90% accurate. Her knowledge of astrological signs is just this accurate...or perhaps it should be said that she allows it to be that accurate.

It's not a surprise that people are helpless in the face of unknown fate. They will give up everything, just to get a slight glimpse of what the future holds. Intelligent and calculating, as well as possessing a sound mind, Aurora uses her way with words and enticing beauty to travel to various nations, slipping in with the nobles and elites, using fortune-telling and other suggestive methods to gather information on whatever she needs.

After one of her fortune readings, Aurora had the sudden bright idea to see what her own future holds. When she saw her sliver hair-donning and red-wearing self among the stars, she scoffed and buried it in the depths of her memory. It won't be until a long, long time has passed when she finally remembers what she saw on that starry night...

◆22 yrs old (3rd of Maple Month)
◆164cm 
◆CV：KEIKO

column1:
沙漠王国的女王，沉稳冷静，高贵而神秘。作为沙漠王国的统治者，在处理国政上相当用心；却因各种降临在王国中的天灾人祸，而不得民众爱戴。面对人民的责难、王国内部激化的冲突，逐渐感到力不从心。

虽然肩负沉重的压力，内心感到挫折，但鲜少表露出脆弱的一面。只会在将军雷萨的面前卸下心防，对其抱持着复杂难以言喻的情感。
column2:
Queen of the Desert Kingdom, Diana is calm and collected, carrying herself with an air of nobility and mystery. As the ruler of the Desert Kingdom, she puts her utmost effort into dealing with political affairs. However, due to a variety of disasters that befell the Desert Kingdom, she has not garnered the love and respect of the people. Having to face both the critiques of the people and intensifying internal conflicts within the nation, she has gradually felt that she is not as strong as she would wish.

Though she bears a heavy burden and feels frustrated inside, she rarely reveals a weak side. She will only put down her guard around General Lazer, where she maintains a complicated expression that is hard to put into words.

◆18 yrs old (5th of Rain Month)
◆162cm 
◆CV: Yoshida Seiko

沙漠王国的女王，沉稳冷静，高贵而神秘。作为沙漠王国的统治者，在处理国政上相当用心；却因各种降临在王国中的天灾人祸，而不得民众爱戴。面对人民的责难、王国内部激化的冲突，逐渐感到力不从心。

压抑内心的不安与对自我的质疑，坐上女王之位的黛安娜，将为沙漠王国翻开新的篇章。
column2:
Queen of the Desert Kingdom, Diana is calm and collected, carrying herself with an air of nobility and mystery. As the ruler of the Desert Kingdom, she puts her utmost effort into dealing with political affairs. However, due to a variety of disasters that befell the Desert Kingdom, she has not garnered the love and respect of the people. Having to face both the critiques of the people and intensifying internal conflicts within the nation, she has gradually felt that she is not as strong as she would wish.

Though she bears a heavy burden and feels frustrated inside, she rarely reveals a weak side. She will only put down her guard around General Lazer, where she maintains a complicated expression that is hard to put into words.

Uneasy about her repressed emotions and doubtful of herself, Diana, sitting on the Queen's throne, will turn the page to a new chapter for the Desert Kingdom.

◆24 yrs old (5th of Rain Month)
◆162cm 
◆CV: Yoshida Seiko

column1:
于戏，来吧来吧快靠近。
不请自来的魑魅魍魉即将莅临。
恐惧是佳肴，哭泣声是甘洌美酒，
跟着阴阳之灯游荡向东前行。
毋论来自此方彼方，
胆小鬼请早点就寝上床。
今宵正是摩根马戏团带来的百鬼夜行。

呜呼，千万千万请当心。
丑时三刻记住别惹绅士生气。
伤透鲸鱼的心可能会被冻结成冰，
让让路，着了火的刺猬速度无人能及。
来来来，快快跟上我们的脚步──
今宵正是摩根马戏团带来的百鬼夜行！
column2:
Ooh! Come closer, yes, please do! The demons all have come for you. Fears their food and tears their wine. Following lights on the eastern line. Whether they're real or just in your head. All cowardly children had best go to bed. For tonight is Morgan's devil's night time!

Alas! Look out, please do, think twice! In the early morn' he'll cause you mire. The whale's cold heart is frozen ice. The hedgehog's anger, hot as fire. Come, come and stay on the rhyme. For tonight is Morgan's devil's night time!

◆18 yrs old (27th of Frost month)
◆158 cm
◆CV: Kayano Ai

column1:
自称凡泰缇大陆最厉害的神偷。身手矫健、个性张扬，偷窃前会丢预告信却从未失手，是令各大贵族又爱又恨的神秘怪盗。

在浮夸的妆容与排场下，其实是个朴素土气的文学少女，对自己的外表有些自卑，梦想成为罗曼史小说里的主人公，谈一场浪漫的恋爱。

因为一次委托，意外成为某位爱情大师的头号弟子兼搭档，为寻找宿命之恋人而努力修读恋爱学分中！
column2:
The self-proclaimed, unrivaled master thief of Vendacti, she's strong, vigorous, and flamboyant as can be. Even though she makes it a point to announce her entrance before she strikes, she has yet to be outwitted. This has caused her both the disdain and admiration of the high-ranking nobles.

Underneath the grandiose looks and shows of extravagance lies a simple, unsophisticated young woman who loves romance novels. Though she has self-doubts about her looks, she dreams of being the heroine of a story, falling head over heels in love.

Due to some odd circumstances and an unlikely job, she found herself the foremost disciple of a great master of romance, as well as his constant companion, all for the hope of finding her one, true love!

变身怪盗摘星后信心倍增，认为周遭的男性都对自己一见钟情。 「我真是罪过的女人呀～」活力满满的琼安，今天依然活在美好的幻想世界里☆
column2:
The self-proclaimed, unrivaled master thief of Vendacti, she's strong, vigorous, and flamboyant as can be. Even though she makes it a point to announce her entrance before she strikes, she has yet to be outwitted. This has caused her both the disdain and admiration of the high-ranking nobles.

Underneath the grandiose looks and shows of extravagance lies a simple, unsophisticated young woman who loves romance novels. Though she has self-doubts about her looks, she dreams of being the heroine of a story, falling head over heels in love.

Due to some odd circumstances and an unlikely job, she found herself the foremost disciple of a great master of romance, as well as his constant companion, all for the hope of finding her one, true love!

Her transformation into the "Thief of the Gleaming Star" gave her a great boost of confidence, making her believe that any man who lays eyes upon her will fall in love at first sight. Alas! What kind of woman is she? Joan is full of energy and hope, living in a beautiful world of pure imagination☆

column1:
谁说新娘是婚礼上最美的女人？至少芙蕾莉卡前男友的婚礼上不是。

收到结婚典礼的邀请函，发现花心分手的前男友竟然比自己先一步寻获幸福？震惊又不甘心的芙蕾莉卡，找来了全太阳王国技艺最高超的裁缝工匠连夜打造婚纱，重金设计最绚丽的浮夸捧花，准备给前男友一个小小的「惊喜」。

婚礼当日，芙蕾莉卡一入场便抢尽风头，成为了全场焦点。魅力四射的芙蕾莉卡，享受完众人的喝采后，大方送上她给予前男友最「真诚的祝福」。收到如此诚挚心意的前男友，想必从此会与他的新娘，过着幸福快乐的日子。
column2:
Who says the bride is always the most stunning woman at the wedding? That certainly wasn't the case in the wedding of Fredrica's ex-boyfriend.

After receiving an invitation to the wedding ceremony and discovering that the womanizer had found true happiness, Fredrica was shocked and simply could not let it go. She hired the most skilled dressmaker in all of the Kingdom of the Sun to work on her wedding dress day and night. Designing the most magnificent, brilliant bouquet at all costs, she was ready to give her ex-boyfriend a little "surprise".

On the day of the wedding, Fredrica stole the show as soon as she made her entrance. She was the center of attention. After enjoying the acclaim of the crowd, the glamorous Fredrica generously gave her "sincerest blessings" to her ex-boyfriend. To have received such a heartfelt expression, there's no doubt her ex-boyfriend will live happily ever after with his new bride.

column1:
在亚特拉斯边境现身的神秘少女，自称来自不同的世界。

拥有天赋异禀的美妙歌声及姣好面貌，因此被经纪公司相中签约，成为家喻户晓的超级偶像，却在出道前因为严重车祸而丧失了过去的记忆。在那之后，她变得相当怕生、无主见，相当依赖身为经纪人的姊姊。

被告知名叫「Aroma White」却没有实感、对一切都感到空虚，PAFF只有在唱歌时才能感到无比的快乐。
column2:
A mysterious teenager who appeared on the border of Atlas. Claims to have come from another world.

Naturally endowed with extraordinary beauty and a stunning voice. For these reasons, she signed a contract with a record label after they took a fancy to her, becoming both a household name and a superstar. However, right before her concert debut she was involved in a serious car accident that left her unable to recall memories from her past. After that, she suddenly began to fear strangers, lacked personal opinions and became entirely reliant on her sister, who also acts as her manager.

She was told that her name is Aroma White, but the name just didn't resonate with her; wherever she looks, all she feels is emptiness. The only time PAFF feels unparalleled happiness is when she's singing.

column1:
在亚特拉斯边境现身的神秘少女，自称来自不同的世界。

本名「朝仓音心」的她以NEKO#ΦωΦ之名在网路上活跃，成为红极一时的超人气实况主，更因特殊的言论风格而吸引到大批粉丝。除此之外，她也是个超级音乐迷，却因为一些经历而相当厌恶PAFF，时常对她冷嘲热讽。

习惯以NEKO自称，说话直接、常常惹事生非，但只要是有趣跟可爱的事物都喜欢，是个活泼善良的好孩子。
column2:
A mysterious teenager who appeared on the border of Atlas. Claims to have come from another world.

NEKO#ΦωΦ's given name is Asakura Neko, a vivid and outgoing girl who's become a streamer that's garnered uber-popularity on the virtual internet. She's drawn in most of her fans due to her unique style of speaking and use of internet slang. She's also a diehard music lover that detests PAFF for things that occurred in the past, often poking fun at and mocking the pop idol.

Used to calling herself NEKO, she speaks directly and often causes trouble. A lover of all things cute and interesting, she's a kind, lively child.

column1:
在亚特拉斯边境现身的神秘女孩，自称来自不同的世界。

一出生便被卖给黑帮，以实验品的身分长大。拥有天才般的智力，但却失去了双脚与声音，始终坐在特别的轮椅上，靠着亲手打造的设备「初号机」模拟声纹与旁人沟通。知晓自己的本名，但从未以「椎野静」自称。

在亲眼看见无数残酷景象之后，Nora变得鲜少与人说话。平时总是面无表情，以冷静的计算及推理面对一切。
column2:
A mysterious teenager who appeared on the border of Atlas. Claims to have come from another world.

Sold to the gangs as soon as she was born, she grew up as an experiment. She possesses genius intelligence but lost both of her legs and her voice. Having used a special wheelchair her entire life, she uses the device known as "Unit-01", which she made herself, to simulate the human voice and communicate with those around her. Though she's aware of her given name, she never goes by Shiino Shizuka.

After seeing countless brutal images with her own eyes, Nora began to rarely speak with others. Usually, she wears an emotionless expression, facing everything with cold calculations and inferences.

column1:
在亚特拉斯边境现身的g̴̡͡p̷̵̨͘͞6̵̨͟͠͠a̴͢͠u̴̢̢͠͡4͞͝ǵw̴̕̕͡͞j́́͏̴̡/̴҉̷͏6͟͏

名为「建造者」的机器人之一，机体编号OPCI_2501_IV。在漫长的j̸̨͞͠p̶̡̕͟6̕͟͏̸̵a͜͠ų̀̀/̛͏ ̢͘e̷̡̧̧͟j́͢͡/̸̵̵̧͞ ̧̕͜͠t̴̷̛͢/̴́̀͝6̷́͟中，OPCI_2501_IV觉醒出自己的意识，拥有和人类相去无几的思考模式。

凭借着核心里回响的2̧̢͢͜0̢͘͢4̸͘͘͘2̸̸̧7̶̀͢，她理解了自己为何于此苏醒。在更深层的黑暗当中，她则有着其他的发现……
column2:
A g̴̡͡p̷̵̨͘͞6̵̨͟͠͠a̴͢͠u̴̢̢͠͡4͞͝ǵw̴̕̕͡͞j́́͏̴̡/̴҉̷͏6͟͏   who appeared on the border of Atlas

Ivy is one of the robots known as an "Architect", serial number OPCI_2501_IV. During the endless j̸̨͞͠p̶̡̕͟6̕͟͏̸̵a͜͠ų̀̀/̛͏ ̢͘e̷̡̧̧͟j́͢͡/̸̵̵̧͞ ̧̕͜͠t̴̷̛͢/̴́̀͝6̷́͟ , OPCI_2501_IV's consciousness was awakened, possessing a mode of thinking that is no different from that of a human. 

Relying on the 2̧̢͢͜0̢͘͢4̸͘͘͘2̸̸̧7̶̀͢   that echoes within her core, she has realized why she has awakened. In the deepest pits of darkness, she has discovered other things as well...

column2:
◆?̵̢͝?͡͠?̴͟͢ yrs old (18th of Ice Month )

column1:
符文学院休学生，专攻符文道具研究，擅长念书与手工艺。生性懒散怕麻烦，认为自己最大的优点就是有自知之明，因此对不拿手的事物会轻易放弃。

于符文学院念书时过着得过且过的求学生活，直到遇上了难解的研究瓶颈，在院长夏尔的建议之下暂时休学，打算前往机械疆域增广见闻。

途经沙漠王国，误打误撞启动了机器人玛莉亚，成为玛莉亚口中的主人，而被牵扯进许多麻烦之中，同时也结交了许多好友。在沙漠王国内的纷乱平息后，再度与玛莉亚一同踏上未知的旅途。
column2:
A student of the Rune Academy that's put his schooling on hold for the moment, Clark's studies focused on rune devices. He's got a talent for both studying and hand craftsmanship. Naturally careless and afraid of all things inconvenient, he believes his best quality to be his self-awareness. As a result, he has no problem putting down something that he doesn't have a knack for.

While studying at the Rune Academy, Clark was satisfied with merely getting by. That continued until his research hit a bottleneck which he was unable to unravel. Under the advice of Headmaster Charle, he temporarily suspended his studies and planned to head to the Mechanical Territory to expand his horizons.

On his way, he passed through the Desert Kingdom and without overthinking it, he activated the robot Maria. His action caused him to become Maria's master (according to her) and got him wrapped up in a whole bunch of inconvenient messes, as well as introduced him to a handful of new friends. After the internal struggles of the Desert Kingdom settled down, he once again set out with Maria on their unknown journey.

◆22 yrs old (17th of Snow Month)
◆164 cm 
◆CV: Daisuke Sakaguchi

column2:
A student of the Rune Academy that's put his schooling on hold for the moment, Clark's studies focused on rune devices. He's got a talent for both studying and hand craftsmanship. Naturally careless and afraid of all things inconvenient, he believes his best quality to be his self-awareness. As a result, he has no problem putting down something that he doesn't have a knack for.

While studying at the Rune Academy, Clark was satisfied with merely getting by. That continued until his research hit a bottleneck which he was unable to unravel. Under the advice of Headmaster Charle, he temporarily suspended his studies and planned to head to the Mechanical Territory to expand his horizons.

On his way, he passed through the Desert Kingdom and without overthinking it, he activated the robot Maria. His action caused him to become Maria's master (according to her) and got him wrapped up in a whole bunch of inconvenient messes, as well as introduced him to a handful of new friends. After the internal struggles of the Desert Kingdom settled down, he once again set out with Maria on their unknown journey.

Clark, a guy who hates inconveniences, has taken Maria, the most inconvenient chick ever, to the Mechanical Territory. He's finally broken through the bottleneck in his research and delved into a new, original rune device and related technology.

◆24 yrs old (17th of Snow Month)
◆164 cm 
◆CV: Daisuke Sakaguchi

column1:
总是能带来好运的玛莉亚，这次也不例外。

沙漠王国的某间餐厅里，克拉克因为无法偿还玛莉亚惹出的大麻烦，主仆俩只好留在厨房帮忙刷盘子，但可爱的玛莉亚引起了店主的注意，于是让她换上充满东方风味的制服，成为店内最强的临时服务生。

络绎不绝的人潮绕了餐厅三圈，就为了一睹玛莉亚的风采。虽然打翻的料理比送出去的还多，却丝毫无损客人对她的喜爱。在她的努力下，主仆俩不只快速还清债务，还倒赚了笔旅行经费……真是因祸得福、可喜可贺！

（不过，「谢谢招待，欢迎再度光临」一度成为玛莉亚改也改不掉的口头禅。）
column2:
Maria brings good luck with her everywhere she goes, and there's no exception this time. 

In a restaurant located in the Desert Kingdom, a whole mess of problems caused by Maria resulted in both Clark and the mechanical maiden doing dishes in the kitchen to make up for the trouble she caused. During this time, the adorable Maria caught the shop owner's attention. He made her put on an oriental styled uniform and whatta you know; she became the most outstanding temporary waiter in the restaurant. 

A non-stop stream of visitors came just to witness Maria's beauty. Although she dropped more dishes than she delivered, her clumsy actions didn't influence the customers' love of her. With the help of Maria's hard work, Clark and Maria not only paid their debt back quickly, they also earned some extra cash for travel. It turned out to be a blessing in disguise, something worth celebrating! 

(Funny thing is, for a period of time, "Thanks for coming, please come again" become Maria's signature phrase that she just couldn't shake.)

◆163cm
◆CV：大谷育江

column1:
出生于太阳王国，因过人的武术天赋，而被选为交换留学生前往东方。个性爽朗重义气，外表看似强悍，实则纤细体贴，意外有着感性的一面。

身怀异于常人的怪力，起初习武不得要领，多亏师父洛的因材施教才有所长进，因此内心对洛十分尊敬。为了取得东方联邦比武大会的参赛资格踏上旅程，途中被卷入沙漠王国的内乱，短暂回到太阳王国后，便再度与洛前往东方联邦。
column2:
Born in the Kingdom of the Sun, because of her outstanding martial arts talent, she was chosen as an exchange student to study in the East. She's got a candid demeanor and is extremely loyal to her friends.  Although she looks tough, she's actually got a soft side. 

Although she possesses superhuman strength, during the initial stages of her martial arts training, she was unable to grasp the main components of the art. Thanks to her master, Law, she started making progress. This caused her to cultivate great respect for her master. In order to become eligible for a tournament in the East Alliance, she began her journey, where she got caught up in the civil strife that occurred in the Desert Kingdom. After returning to the Kingdom of the Sun for a short period of time, she then headed to the East Alliance with Law.

◆22 yrs old (8th of Flower Month)
◆174 cm 
◆CV: Noto Mamiko

◆22 yrs old (8th of Flower Month)

column1:
一年一度，贫民窟的联合庆生会即将到来。

为了一圆孩子们想玩东方游戏的愿望，雅辛托斯搜集手边可用的素材，将破布缝制成幻想中的忍者套装、老旧镰刀改造成双拐武器。着装完毕的她在庆生会中惊喜现身，并带领孩子们一同对抗纳杰尔扮演的邪恶魔王。

虽然双拐刀在激烈的战斗中解体、忍者服也已破烂不堪，但能看见大家灿烂的笑容，仍让雅辛托斯感到无比满足。 「想要努力制造更多美好回忆……」默默许下诚挚心愿，比任何人都在乎孩子们的雅辛托斯，明年也准备好要大显身手了。
column2:
The annual joint birthday celebration in the Slums is right around the corner.

To fulfill the kids' wish to play a game about the East, Hyacinthus collected some materials that would come in handy for her little project. She sewed a ninja suit with rags and turned an old sickle into a pair of tonfas. After putting on her costume, she showed up at the birthday celebration as a surprise and led the kids in a fight against the evil devil, played by Nigel.

Although her tonfas crumbled in battle and the ninja suit was torn apart, seeing the bright smile on everyone's faces made Hyacinthus feel satisfied beyond words. At that moment, she made a silent wish: "I want to do my best to create even more wonderful memories...". Given that Hyacinthus cares about the kids more than anybody, next year she's going to show everybody what she's really capable of.

◆16 yrs old (1st of Rain Month)
◆165 cm 
◆CV: Hikasa Yōko

column1:
这天本来是杰罗姆难得的休假日，却因为与不请自来的芙蕾莉卡发生争执而变得乌烟瘴气。

起因是芙蕾莉卡一早侵门踏户，软硬兼施地要求杰罗姆穿戴自己研发的符文武器，并夸大休假时遇上各种麻烦的可能性。不堪其扰的杰罗姆只好逃离住处，独自来到郊外散心，却意外偶遇歹徒闹事。手无寸铁的杰罗姆忆起芙蕾莉卡的话语，他将两截式腰带往内一扣，内藏的装甲立刻包覆住全身要害，震惊之余，杰罗姆已化身为轻甲骑士，以拳头与踢击将对手打得落花流水！

死里逃生的杰罗姆，对将军的亏欠与崇敬又多了一分，胸口甚至泛起阵阵陌生的涟漪……直到他发现，芙蕾莉卡忘记加上撤回装甲的符文为止。
column2:
Today was supposed to be Jerome's hard-earned day off, but after Fredrica invited herself along for the ride and disagreements arose, the atmosphere took a turn for the worse.

Early in the morning, Fredrica barged into Jerome's house using any means necessary to convince him to wear the rune device she had developed herself, all the while exaggerating the various annoyances one might encounter on one's day off. Unable to bear the harassment, Jerome had no choice but to flee his residence, heading to the outskirts of town to take his mind off everything. Unarmed and defenseless, Jerome remembered what Fredrica had said and clipped his belt into place. Immediately, the armor protecting his organs covered his entire body from harm. By the time the shock wore off, Jerome had already become a light-armored knight, using his fists and feet to pummel his opponents into a state of scurvy sorrow!

Having escaped by the skin of his teeth, both Jerome's respect for and indebtedness to Fredrica increased. From time to time, strange ripples emerged on his chest... Until he finally realized that Fredrica had forgotten to add a rune that would remove the armor.

column1:
◆ 23岁（霞月二十二日）

◆ CV：铃木达央
column2:

◆ 178cm
◆ CV: Suzuki Tatsuhisa

column1:
透明外套也难以衬托的，是璃以狡猾包装的甜蜜真心。

为了有效利用假期，意外将人类与亚人的心系在一起。
沙坑、城堡、佐以鲜果补给；她试图以崭新的回忆，
填补姊弟无法相见时的空白时光……

在沙堡随风消逝之后，璃与琉在那年夏日约定好的梦想，
将会持续发酵，永不过期……
column2:
It's hard to set off a transparent jacket, but Leah's done just that, wrapping her pure, sweet heart in crafty cunning.

In order to make the best use of her vacation, she's happened to bind the minds and hearts of humans and demihumans. Sandboxes, castles, and fresh fruit supplies; she's trying to create new memories to make up for the lost time she couldn't spend with her brother...

After the sand castles have blown away, the promise Leah and Lio made this summer vacation will carry on. It'll last forever...

◆13 yrs old (11th of Sun month)
◆145 cm 
◆CV: Sakura Ayane

column1:
防晒罩衫也难以防备的，是芙蕾莉卡胜过骄阳的火辣身段。

为了获得特殊休假，意外将盛典的热浪带进亚特拉斯。阳光、美酒、佐以帅哥相伴；她以热情融化对立，将公务打造成心目中的梦幻假期……

在专属躺椅之上，征服了新朋友们的芙蕾莉卡，属于她的激情炎夏才正要开始……
column2:
Even her gown that provides protection from the sun can't guard against Fredrica's sexy figure, which is hotter than that scorching star.

In order to garner some extra vacation days, a summer ceremony found its way into Atlas. Sunlight, fine wine, and hot studs; Fredrica's used her passion to melt the nay-sayers, turning official business into a phenomenal vacation...

Fredrica has conquered her new friends and lounges on a recliner all her own. This hot, passionate summer of hers has only just begun...

◆ 29 yrs old (1st of Dawn month)
◆ 166 cm
◆ CV: Koshimizu Ami

column1:
防水布料也难以包覆的，是黯月初试泳装的青涩姿态。

为了同伴而拼命掩饰笨拙，意外吸引众人炽热的目光。驭水、乘风、佐以完美平衡；她踏上板子于湖面穿梭，以清凉的水花驱散亚特拉斯的酷暑热气……

在园游会落幕之后，同伴们的笑容将深藏于黯月心中，成为往后继续守护的意义……
column2:
What waterproof fabric can't cover is the fresh look on Yamitsuki's face when she puts on a swimsuit for the first time.

Dressing up her clumsiness for her companions' sake, she accidentally brought all the attention to her. Maintaining perfect balance, controlling wind and water, she stands on a board while whipping back and forth on the lake. The cool splashes she creates disperses the Atlas heat...

After the fair ended, the smiles of her companions remain in Yamitsuki's mind. These smiles become the drive that motivates her to keep protecting others...

◆ 21 yrs old (9th of Frost month)
◆ 158 cm
◆ CV: Miyazaki Ui

column1:
料理围裙也难以掩饰的，是泉唯恐天下不乱的坏心眼。

因为有趣而推波助澜，意外开启事业第二春。蔬菜、兽肉、佐以独门刀法；他点燃的不只是炭火，也是不坦率的人们那颗骚动的心……

在烤肉炊烟之中，泉若隐若现的真挚笑颜，成为那年夏季回味无穷的风景……
column2:
What an apron can't cover up is Izumi's need for the world to be chaotic.

Out of pure self-interest, he stumbled upon a second career. Vegetables, beast meat, and unique knife skills; he's ignited not only charcoal, but also the riotous minds of the people that was once concealed.

The genuine smile that appeared on Izumi's face seemed to wax and wane amid the smoke, becoming a sight from that summer that's always worth retasting...

column1:
◆自称永远的17岁（枫月三十日）
◆160cm
◆CV：植田佳奈
column2:
◆ Self-proclaimed forever 17 (30th of Maple month)
◆ 160 cm
◆CV: Ueda Kana

column1:
东方联邦中麒麟族的少主。身为尊贵的风系神兽，能够自由操控灵风进行攻击，外型俊美又擅长甜言蜜语，是全东方赫赫有名的纨绔子弟。

因双腿残疾备受父亲轻视，而对世事过于天真的性格，也常被人暗中嘲笑。但本性温柔且重感情的他，自称是恋家的和平主义者，对汀朵伊姆的想法与处境能感同身受，也越来越在意起这位身不由己的质子公主。
column2:
Lord of the Qilin Tribe, located within the East Alliance. As a mystical beast from the Wind Sect, he can control the spirit winds freely to initiate attacks. A sweet talker with a fabulous look, he's a renowned dandy in the east.

Scorned by his father due to his handicapped legs, he was secretly laughed at by others because of his naive personality. Naturally tender, affectionate, and a self-proclaimed pacifist who loves his family, he relates to Tindoiimu and fully understands what she's going through. His concern for this princess whose freedom was involuntarily taken away grows deeper by the day.

◆24 yrs old (14th of Fire month) 
◆176cm
◆CV: Hirakawa Daisuke

His concern for this princess whose freedom was involuntarily taken away grows deeper by the day.

◆24 yrs old (14th of Fire month) 
◆176cm
◆CV: Hirakawa Daisuke

column1:
东方联邦中麒麟族的少主。身为尊贵的风系神兽，能够自由操控灵风进行攻击，外型俊美又擅长甜言蜜语，是全东方赫赫有名的纨绔子弟。

因双腿残疾备受父亲轻视，而对世事过于天真的性格，也常被人暗中嘲笑。但本性温柔且重感情的他，自称是恋家的和平主义者，对汀朵伊姆的想法与处境能感同身受，也越来越在意起这位身不由己的质子公主。

穿上华服的卷云，有别于平时吊儿郎当的模样，将展现出不同以往的神兽威仪与风采……
column2:
Lord of the Qilin Tribe, located within the East Alliance. As a mystical beast from the Wind Sect, he can control the spirit winds freely to initiate attacks. A sweet talker with a fabulous look, he's a renowned dandy in the east.

Scorned by his father due to his handicapped legs, he was secretly laughed at by others because of his naive personality. Naturally tender, affectionate, and a self-proclaimed pacifist who loves his family, he relates to Tindoiimu and fully understands what she's going through. His concern for this princess whose freedom was involuntarily taken away grows deeper by the day.

When Juan Yun puts on his Sunday best, it's in stark contrast to the sloppy look he reps on ordinary days. He'll show the world what the awe-inspiring presence of a mythical beast really looks like...

◆24 yrs old (14th of Fire month) 
◆176cm
◆CV: Hirakawa Daisuke

column1:
东方联邦中水系的水母兽人。擅长药理与治疗的气脉之术，行事大胆独立、博学多识，曾是莫里斯的秘密学生。

身为长生不死的水母一族，在年老寿命将近时，会重新恢复到幼年阶段，也因此为填补漫长的人生而求知若渴。在符文学院与不按牌理出牌的蒂卡一拍即合，大方邀请她与艾利欧来到东方做研究。

性格活泼但做事果决理性，阅历丰富却不带成见与包袱，备受东方兽人们的敬重。
column2:
A Jellyfish belonging to the Water Sect in the East Alliance, she's an expert in pharmacology and healing Qi energy. Not only is she bold and knowledgeable, she was also a secret student of Morris'.

As a member of the Jellyfish tribe, she'll live forever, and when she becomes old and weak, she'll return to her infancy stage. Her endless thirst for knowledge allows her to fill up her neverending days. While visiting the Rune Academy, she became best friends with the unpredictable Tica the first time they met, even inviting her and Elio to carry out research in the east.

She's lively but rational when it comes to decision making. With abundant life experience that carries no bias or burden, she's revered by the Beasts from the east.

◆167cm
◆CV：阿澄佳奈

column2:
A Jellyfish belonging to the Water Sect in the East Alliance, she's an expert in pharmacology and healing Qi energy. Not only is she bold and knowledgeable, she was also a secret student of Morris'.

As a member of the Jellyfish tribe, she'll live forever, and when she becomes old and weak, she'll return to her infancy stage. Her endless thirst for knowledge allows her to fill up her neverending days. While visiting the Rune Academy, she became best friends with the unpredictable Tica the first time they met, even inviting her and Elio to carry out research in the east.

She's lively but rational when it comes to decision making. With abundant life experience that carries no bias or burden, she's revered by Beasts from the east.

Although Li Hwa has returned to her infancy stage, she continues her earnest studies regardless of her body size, expecting to bring hope and crucial changes to the existing world.
